Text: Catching Uppst So who was that crazy woman beating on the glass It was great seeing you again Sorry we werent able to catch up in Chicago As I said Im relocating to Houston Well be moving the Anderson gang down here next week Ill be working in Enron Freight Markets The learning curve is pretty vertical for now but its a great opportunity for me Got any time to get together in the near future Id love to catch up and hear what you are up tomight even have to steal some of your great ideas and use them in Freight Im here through Thursday Joel Joel Anderson Enron Freight Markets Enron Center South ECS Houston TX Office Fax
